description: Architectural metric thresholds to prevent complexity creep and architectural erosion

files.description: Track file count growth to prevent excessive project expansion

nesting.description: Limit directory nesting to maintain project navigability

complexity.description: Prevent function and class bloat. CCN >15 is considered high complexity.

coupling.description: Enforce loose coupling and prevent circular dependencies

notes: Thresholds should be adjusted based on project size and complexity
warn_threshold_percent applies to all metrics with max values (80% = warning, 100% = failure)
Set to 0 for metrics that should never occur (e.g., circular dependencies)
Update this file when project characteristics change significantly
